Title: Broken Hearts
Plot: Saul catches up with an old friend and discovers evidence of covert activities by Estes. Brody and Vice President Walden find themselves at odds over the future of their political relationship, while Dana and Finn come to terms with their own differences.
GuestStars: David Bishins, Gordon Dillard Jr., Chad Kurtz, Hrach Titizian, Navid Negahban, David Marciano, F. Murray Abraham
